data.name: The Lion's Song: Episode 4 - Closure
data.detailed_description:
Find out how the stories of our heroes and heroines intertwine in the grand finale of "The Lion's Song".
How are Wilma, Franz, Emma connected and how did the player's decisions change their lives?
Coming 2017

Please take also a look at the other episodes from The Lion's Song:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/477030
